img_above_text:
![Wukong BlackWind 14.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/1c/Wukong_BlackWind_14.jpg)
After losing about half his health, the Black Wind King will get even more aggressive with his titular wind, and start disappearing entirely in a gust without forming into a wisp. When this happens, retreat and regain your stamina, and be ready for the moment he appears, as he’ll likely do so in mid-combo attack.
img_below_text:
These can include a length combo that he’ll usually start with a shove before stabbing his spear into the ground in front of him, then grabbing onto it to launch himself off feet first before quickly slicing downward at you, and then slamming his fist down for a massive explosion you’ll want to steer clear of.
![Wukong BlackWind 16.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/99/Wukong_BlackWind_16.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong BlackWind 14.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/1c/Wukong_BlackWind_14.jpg)
After losing about half his health, the Black Wind King will get even more aggressive with his titular wind, and start disappearing entirely in a gust without forming into a wisp. When this happens, retreat and regain your stamina, and be ready for the moment he appears, as he’ll likely do so in mid-combo attack."
        - Following Text: "These can include a length combo that he’ll usually start with a shove before stabbing his spear into the ground in front of him, then grabbing onto it to launch himself off feet first before quickly slicing downward at you, and then slamming his fist down for a massive explosion you’ll want to steer clear of.
![Wukong BlackWind 16.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/99/Wukong_BlackWind_16.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts an intense battle scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character engaged in combat with the "Black Wind King," a boss enemy. The boss, partially blurred, is mid-action, emphasizing its aggressive and fast-paced attacks. The text at the bottom of the screen includes a taunt from the Black Wind King, reflecting its antagonistic role. The surrounding environment features a dark, forested area with scattered leaves and glowing embers, adding to the tense atmosphere.
